song.title: Flight Of The Alpha Centauri
song.info:
5th place at Icons 2012 Demoparty in Finland
Possibly my biggest endeavour yet. This song has over 50 audio tracks and instruments and it took a full week to complete. Actually, 'complete' is not the right word, it's merely in a listenable state now ;) The 2nd part with the guitars is losely based on an old idea I had for an .xm track back in 2004.
As always, I hope you'll enjoy! :)
